parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Event Handlers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Defines an action performed just before the preload screen started. Preload event occurs after briefing screen on mission start.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> This event handler also fires on client after user closes the main map. </value></part></template><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Informative</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Since '''Arma 3''' ''v1.57'' a stackable version of this EH is available: [[Arma_3:_Event_Handlers/addMissionEventHandler#PreloadStarted|PreloadStarted]]</value></part></template><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>In order to keep compatibility between official and community content the functions [[BIS_fnc_addStackedEventHandler]] and [[BIS_fnc_removeStackedEventHandler]] should be used instead.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''onPreloadStarted''' command

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> command: [[String]] or [[Code]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[onPreloadStarted]] {[[diag_log]] "preload started"};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[onPreloadFinished]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
